channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A holiday tradition: David Sedaris reads from 'The Santaland Diaries'
item.description: Writer and humorist David Sedaris reads from his holiday essay "The Santaland Diaries."

item.title: The real ping pong champion — and hustler — who inspired 'Marty Supreme'
item.description: Marty Reisman was nicknamed "The Needle" for his slender physique. He dressed well and put on a show.

item.title: A Powerball player in Arkansas has won a $1.817 billion lottery jackpot
item.description: Wednesday's Christmas Eve drawing ended the lottery game's three-month stretch without a top-prize winner. Final ticket sales pushed the jackpot highe...

item.title: Martin Scorsese: Rob Reiner Had Me in the Palm of His Hand
item.description: “We had a natural affinity for each other,” Martin Scorsese writes of Rob Reiner.

item.title: Pope Leo Surprises St. Peter’s Crowd Before Christmas Eve Mass
item.description: Pope Leo XIV greeted the soggy faithful in St. Peter’s Square in both English and Italian and apologized that there wasn’t enough room in the basilica...

item.title: With Airspace Closed, a Lonely Christmas for Many Venezuelans
item.description: The holidays usually bring home huge numbers from the Venezuelan diaspora. But this year, after international airlines halted almost all service, many...

item.title: DOJ says it may need a 'few more weeks' to finish releasing Epstein files
item.description: The Justice Department said Wednesday that it may need a "few more weeks" to release its records on the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein after discov...

item.title: Heavy Rains and Floods Threaten California on Christmas Day
item.description: Much of Southern California remained at risk of potentially deadly floods on Thursday, as heavy rains showed little sign of easing through the week.

item.title: Morning Edition hosts play 'Do You Know Your Ho-Ho-Ho!'
item.description: Morning Edition hosts Michel Martin and Leila Fadel answer holiday trivia questions compiled by Southern Living Magazine.
